allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add hero landing page and customize for OBUS Lab

- Add full-screen hero section with image/video/youtube support
- Customize navbar title with OBUS highlighting \(green bold\)
- Add custom domain \(jnu-obus.com\) configuration
- Add team page and member profiles
- Update publications and site settings
- Remove footer text, enable last_updated

New files:
- _includes/hero.liquid
- _sass/_hero.scss
- assets/js/hero.js
- CNAME

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Prettier code style issues

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Support section to Projects page with card layout

- Split Projects page into Projects and Support sections
- Support section shows funding agencies with logos and project lists
- Card format: agency logo, name, and funded projects with years

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
